proof_of_correctness_methods.name: Mathematical Induction
proof_of_correctness_methods.description: Prove the algorithm works for a base case, then assume correctness for size k and prove it works for size k+1.
proof_of_correctness_methods.best_for: Recursive algorithms, divide-and-conquer algorithms, dynamic programming proofs
proof_of_correctness_methods.example: Proving Merge Sort correctly sorts arrays by induction on array size.

proof_of_correctness_methods.name: Proof by Contradiction
proof_of_correctness_methods.description: Assume the algorithm is incorrect and show that this assumption leads to a logical contradiction.
proof_of_correctness_methods.best_for: Optimality proofs, greedy algorithms, shortest-path algorithms
